name: 2D Shooter (Modified)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project.

These are the modifications Implemented:

1.  Game arena is different on each level. There are different strategies that need to be used as a result.

2. Different color ships/ different sprites.

3. Added higher health enemies- Mini-bosses, higher tier enemies (colored), and a final boss.

Credits-

Created by Ricky McKay
